summary: Lombardy is a region in northern Italy with around 10 million people. It is between the Alps and the Po River. Milan, the capital, is Italy's biggest city and an important place for business in Europe. Lombardy has a lot of small towns and is the most populated region in Italy. It is also one of the richest and has many important historical sites. Many famous people, like artists and scientists, come from Lombardy.
title: Lombardy
